meanings.definition: Spiderworts: a plant of the genus Tradescantia.
meanings.sent1: The spiderworts in the garden have beautiful purple flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted some spiderworts in my backyard for decoration.
meanings.sent3: Why did the spiderworts invite the bees to their party? To have a buzzing good time!
meanings.sent4: The spiderworts in the field danced gracefully in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the spiderworts shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Spiderworts: any plant of the genus Tradescantia.
meanings.sent1: Do you know if the spiderworts near the pond are blooming?
meanings.sent2: There are many different species of spiderworts found in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The spiderworts decided to have a race to see who could grow the tallest.
meanings.sent4: The spiderworts in the forest stood tall like guardians of nature.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the spiderworts brightened up the meadow.
